𓊸

𓊪 ≈ 𓎺 𓎻 𓐐 𓊸 "b" bucket 𓃜 bock ( Champollion ) 𓊪 ≈ 𓎺 𓎻 𓐐 𓊸 "b" bowl with smoke 𓊪 ≈ 𓎺 𓎻 𓐐 𓊸 "b" بخور baḵūr incense

R7 𓊸 Ram = Bock 𓃜 بخور baḵūr 𓊸 bucket 𓊸⋍𓎻𓎺𓌰𓐝𓐎

𓐐 𓊸 "b" ⇔ burners braziers firing pyraunos

𓐐 𓊸 "b" ⇔ burner <> le'punu 𒁍𒉡 𒈜𒁍𒉡 lup-pu-nu 𒈜𒁍𒉡 incense?

INK scent 𓐍 𓈖 𓌰 𓐝 𓏮 𓊸 𓏥 smell #snTr #khn…m incense 𓊹 𓌢 𓈖 𓏏 𓂋 𓊸 Geweih(rauch) ⇔ Indra-Bakur
